data.eml:eml: Descriptions of two new species and one new subspecies from the Exocelinaokbapensis-group, and notes on the E. aipo-group (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae, Copelatinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shaverdo, Helena, Sumoked, Bob, Balke, Michael (2017): Descriptions of two new species and one new subspecies from the Exocelinaokbapensis-group, and notes on the E. aipo-group (Coleoptera, Dytiscidae, Copelatinae). ZooKeys 715: 17-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.715.15913, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.715.15913
